name: Wizzardo
description:
Defend yourself against the oncoming wave.   You're a wizard,  you wave your wand to summon attack and defense.  Trace the geometric shapes on the sword and shield symbols to summon.  They come from both sides.  

This game was created in 2 days for the 2022 Geo Jam with the theme of Pick A Side.

Controls:  

Mouse Left Click and hold down to trace.

Release Left Mouse Click to activate summon.  

Art - Diana

Programming - Mike
